thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The confirmation email after booking on line came quickly. Plans changed and it wasn't an issue to give them a call to change the date and again a confirmation email came quickly. The guy that came to do the fitting phoned to confirm times on the day and was lovely. It's great having the convenience of a visit at home rather than hanging around a garage to wait. Would definitely recommend this approach to everyone else thinking of using them. This is the 2nd time I've used them and had the same experience on both. Great service!!
